citations.narrative:
The facility is conducting regulated activity without a license from USDA APHIS Animal Care under the Animal Welfare
Act (AWA). On September 20, 2025, a search was conducted by a USDA inspector. Seven parakeets in three different
enclosures were being auctioned off or had already been sold. The customer no longer holds a USDA license.
Conducting regulated activity without a USDA license does not allow for the inspection of the regulated animals' health
and well-being in accordance with the Animal Welfare Act. Continuing to conduct regulated activity without a license is a
serious violation of the Animal Welfare Act. The customer must either stop selling/auctioning off regulated animals or the
customer must obtain a USDA license.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End of report.
n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
The facility is conducting regulated activity without a license from USDA APHIS Animal Care under the Animal Welfare 
Act (AWA). On September 20, 2025, a search was conducted by a USDA inspector. Seven parakeets in three different 
enclosures were being auctioned off or had already been sold. The customer no longer holds a USDA license. 
Conducting regulated activity without a USDA license does not allow for the inspection of the regulated animals' health 
and well-being in accordance with the Animal Welfare Act. Continuing to conduct regulated activity without a license is a 
serious violation of the Animal Welfare Act. The customer must either stop selling/auctioning off regulated animals or the 
customer must obtain a USDA license. 
 
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A LICENSE IS OBTAINED. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End of report.
